title: Changing your username
content:
I wish to change my username, to make it more peronal now that I feel safe around all these typographical outlaws.   
   
I tried to edit my profile. No go.   
   
help?   
mwah
author: gareth

comments.content: I dont think its possible, right now, to change your current user name, by yourself.. _Maybe you should contact and ask an admin or a moderator to do so and change it.?_
